short_summary: Kenworth T680E Electric Class VIII Tractor
description: Purchase one (1) Kenworth T680E Electric Class VIII Tractor and related items.
full_summary:
Title
================

Request for Proposal (RFP) - WS4273843461
-------------------------------------

**Kenworth T680E Electric Class VIII Tractor**

**Public Notice**

## Key Dates
- **Publication Date**: January 31, 2024
- **Tender Closing Date**: February 19, 2024, at 14:00 EST
- **Amendment Date**: February 7, 2024
- **Expected Contract Start Date**: December 12, 2023
- **Expected Contract End Date**: December 12, 2024

## Procurement Details
- **Procurement Category**: Goods and Services (GD)
- **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding
- **Trade Agreements**: None
- **Geographic Regions**: National Capital Region (NCR)

## Solicitation Conditions
- **Solicitation Status**: Expired (Note: The closing time was modified.)
- **Bid Submission**: All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted on February 19, 2024, by 14:00 EST. Late bids will be declared non-responsive.

## Goods and Services Required
Canada is seeking offers to provide one (1) Kenworth T680E Electric Class VIII Tractor and related items to Transport Canada (TC).

## Contact Information
- **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
- **Contact Person**: Valerie Matheson (she/her)
- **Contact Email**: valerie.matheson@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
- **Note**: For any queries or requirements, please contact the above-mentioned contact person directly.

The rewritten content does not "ramble" or include unnecessary language. The rewritten content is concise and clearly formatted. Let me know if I can make changes!
